resources.string:
This application is provided to the CoCoRaHS community at no charge. It was developed by Steve Woodruff, SC-CR-64, out of a desire to submit reports on the way out of the house each morning via an Android device. If you have any features you would like to see added, you can email steve@appcay.com with the details.

Like what you see?

Note that donations do not enable any additional functionality in this application.
